titleStmt.title: Phlebotomiographia or, a treatise of phlebotomy. Demonstrating the necessity of it in diseases; the time for elections. And likewise of the use and application of cupping-glasses, and leeches. Whereupon is added a brief and most methodicall tract of the crisis. Written originally in French, by Da de Plumis Campi chirurgion. And now faithfully rendred into English, by E.W. well-wisher to physick and chirurgery.
titleStmt.author: Planis Campy, David de.
E. W.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Streater, for John Place, at Furnisalls-Inne Gate; and William Place, at Grayes-Inne Gate, next Holburn,

notesStmt.note: First word of title is in Greek characters.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
